title: Find the 'Stern Librarian' Ffion
content: selecting the first option, she rationalizes that death is commonplace in Baldur's Gate and emphasizes her business priorities. Subsequently, inquire about the possibility of receiving a reward, and she will direct your attention to the drow twins in the taproom. She provides you with a key to the Sharess' Caress Rooms and suggests you introduce yourself as a gift from Mamzell to witness their legendary status among patrons. This key acquisition concludes the "Find the 'Stern Librarian' Ffion" q
